Hmmm. Lemme guess, there will be some sort of cheating and maybe not really full retarded ntr. Once the girl becomes a fully pledged idol, she'll see the true world and get swallowed by it. She'll know the pleasure and will succumb to it,  cheating on our mc. Then she will be caught, breaks up with him and our mc will find comfort on someone else, the manager probably. Or maybe not? He'll be just sad and really, really down. Anyways, author inserts some drama here, drama there. More hot sex here, and more hot sex there. Then finally, 3 endings are possible. (1) they will realize even after having sex with other people, their hearts are only for each other. They will make up and done, Happy ending. (2) They'll realize that the world doesn't revolve around them and will separate paths after some heart to heart talks, bittersweet ending, I'd say. (3) The girl will be swept by pleasure, being an idol and a nympho at the same time, while our mc will move on.
